Everything else can be fixed in the future. 

Demographics and rigged elections are literally all we need addressed. If Republicans can't fix these 2 things by midterms then we should be protesting outside of their homes. They should be made complete uncomfortable and scared of their base until they give us these 2 things. Their wives should feel our anger when they go out to their social clubs. 

It's not solely Trump's job to try to fix everything. These COWARDS in congress need to work for us. They should be mocked in conservative counties until they give us real solutions. I want to see laws addressing these problems.

posts.raw_content:
At this point, I have no confidence that the Republicans in the Senate will do it. They have no intention do it. They don't care.

If they were going to do it and help Trump ram his agenda through, you'd think they would've already started doing it. It's so obvious, the only reason why they're not doing it is because they literally don't give a shit. They have no more loyalty to America than the Democrats do, which is to say they have absolutely none whatsoever.

This, combined with the likeliness of SCOTUS ruling against Trump's tariffs like he seems to think will happen based on his latest Truth posts, makes me believe that there's only one more thing that can possibly be done to save America.

Hey @Trump it's time to invoke the Insurrection Act. I know it's a heavy and brash action, I understand you've wanted to exhaust every other possible option first, but it appears we've gotten to that point now. Desperate times call for desperate measures. You know you have the authority to do this given your acknowledgement of it last month, you can ignore the corrupt courts when doing it. If the Democrats ever get back into power, they'll throw you and your whole family in prison, and I doubt you'd want that so you might as well just go completely scorched earth and get the military to arrest all the corrupt people in power.
